local_updates: Valentine’s Weekend: expect heavier late-night movement Fri/Sat plus earlier ‘date-night’ waves around dinner → bar transition.
Shawnee: Brickhouse + Grand Casino weekend traffic should stack; plan for tighter pickup windows and faster turnarounds.
Bricktown/Downtown: live-music pockets (like Toby Keith’s I Love This Bar) can create short-trip surges before/after sets.
